name: Last AirBaller
description:
This game is a mixture of basketball and parkour. In this game you will have to score as many shots as possible in order to beat your opponent. The catch is that the more you air ball the faster the water rises. If the water reaches you at a certain point, you will have to restart.

Background:

You are a legendary air baller, to redeem yourself you must score the ball in hoop. However, its too high for you to score. Suddenly platforms appear out of nowhere for you to jump on to get closer to the hoop. As the timer goes down there is a flood coming! You miss a shot and the water rises more. Hurry score as much as you can and redeem yourself.

Shooting Baskets Attack of The Weird Men
